definition: to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Otherwise the astrologer should make an appropriate referral.
sentences.chinese: 否则，占星家应作出适当的转介。

sentences.english: For referral or check details, pls. contact Shirley Naturopathic Holistic Centre.
sentences.chinese: 如需转介或查询详情，请联络莎莉自然疗法医疗中心。

sentences.english: For referral or details, pls. contact Shirley Naturopathic Holistic Centre.
sentences.chinese: 如需转介或查询详情，请联络莎莉自然疗法医疗中心。

sentences.english: As soon as possible, the teacher stops by the office to fill out a referral form and check with the principal.
sentences.chinese: 教师应尽快去行政处填写一张转介表格，联系校长。

sentences.english: Early Nephrology Referral Aids Planned Implantation of Peritoneal Catheter and …
sentences.chinese: 转介有助于乡下地区腹膜透析的早期植管与利用。

definition: to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
(Tw) to make a telephone call (generally as a representative of a company, school or agency etc, to an individual, often for the purpose of conducting a survey) (abbr. for 電話訪問|电话访问)
(Tw) medical checkup/physical examination (abbr. for 健康檢查|健康检查[jian4 kang1 jian3 cha2])
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
mental disorder (abbr. for 精神障礙|精神障碍[jing1 shen2 zhang4 ai4]) (Tw)
the insured person/the person covered by an insurance policy
